Texts.Chs: 一个可以存储许多物品的设备，它的运作方式看起来和我的不太一样。
Texts.Eng: A device that holds many items. It appears to function differently from our own.

Texts.Chs: 一个灵活的存储设备，带有一个ICE-3加密锁。非常安全。
Texts.Eng: A slick storage rig with an ICE-3 encrypted lock.  My gear's safe here!

Texts.Chs: 一个存储系统。它的功能看起来像我的一样强大。
Texts.Eng: A storage device, seems to function a lot like my own.

Texts.Chs: 显而易见的。一个Kirhosi存储系统。
Texts.Eng: Stating the obvious. A Kirhosi storage system.
